panel.name: login_progress_panel
panel.string: An Update is available and being downloaded...
The [http://niranv-sl.blogspot.de/ Blog] contains cool pictures and information about updates and features.
You can move with <green>A W S</green> and <green>D</green>.
You can hold <green>RightMouseButton</green> to turn your avatar around.
Your current FPS is displayed at the top right.
<green>[CTRL] + [P]</green> = Preferences.
<green>[CTRL] + [I]</green> = Inventory.
<green>[CTRL] + [M]</green> = Map.
<green>[CTRL] + [Shift] + [M]</green> = Minimap.
You can search in the Navigationbar too.
<green>RightMouseButton</green> on Navigationbar - Show Coordinates.
You can alter height by changing the last coordinate in the Navigationbar.
<green>[CTRL] + [F]</green> = Search.
<green>MiddleMouseButton</green> toggles Voice by default.
You can move all toolbar buttons to either top, bottom, left or right.
You should undock the local chat with the diagonal arrow.
You can click online notifications to start a conversation.
Look for secondlife:///app/agent/a7fe20fa-1e95-4f87-aa8f-86496c78c1e5/about if you need more help.
In Preferences - Keybindings you can change all movement and camera controls.
You can reset slider options in Preferences - Display with the [default] button.
Colorful people are not bugged. It's a feature. Preferences - Display.
<icon>Caution_Widget</icon> Yellow badges on checkboxes warn you about possible problems they might cause.
<icon>Default_Widget</icon> Blue badges on checkboxes represent the Linden Viewer's "Ultra" settings.
You should verify your E-mail on SL's website in order to receive offline mails in the future.
<green>[CTRL] + [Shift] + RightMouseButton</green> on UI widgets to reset their option to default.
<green>[CTRL] + MouseScrollWheel</green> on sliders and spinners to scroll values up and down. Add <green>[Shift]</green> to scroll faster.
